name: Jumpy Slice
description:
Description:

This game is a physics based fighting game where the objective is to knock the other player off the edge of the map. 

Controls:

Use the mouse to move the weapon of the character around. Moving the weapon against the ground allows the player to move around.

Credits:

Coding of mechanics - Ronald DeSilva

3D Model for characters made by MelterWRKS and downloaded from sketchfab.com - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/scp-personnel-92f90d6f84d04334b3d52b76f9c0cb46

Cover image courtesy of https://giphy.com/gifs/ninja-laminutecaprice-en-cas-de-caprice-26h0oZIGGOFZdZj4Q
